Posts.Content: Hi Thank you for your reply.  I  decided not to have reconstruction straight away because of the recovery and also the wait to have the op.  do you knoww what the group is called please ?
Posts.Title: mri results in

Posts.Content: I got my mri results on Friday and they wernt good, it showed up more lumps so ive definitely got to hate a mastectomy followed by chemo. the good news is I only have to wait until the 21St for my op. at the moment im not so worried about the op or even what i'll look like after im more concerned about if im going to be able to look after my children properly ? they are 18,16 and 16 months. iam a single parent,  i do have a few friends and my sister and my older two children who i know will help me but they all have jobs apart from the kids they are in sixth form, im worried about my youngest i don't want him to feel pushed out.  is there anyone who has gone through similar with young children could you give me some advice please.
Posts.Title: mri results in
